casebody.data:
EDWARDS, et al.
v.
FOLEY, et al. 200P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 7, 2017 Walter L. Tippett, Jr., Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Kimberly M. Marston, Attorney at Law, for Foley, Clyde M., et al. Michael Kaeding, Attorney at Law, Durham, Alexander C. Dale, Edward J. Coyne, III, Attorneys at Law, Wilmington, Bryan M. Knight, Attorney at Law, for Edwards, Barry D., et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of June 2017 by Bryan M. Knight for Admission Pro Hac Vice:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of December 2017."
